Sequence Information.Peptide Name: PRW3 (synthetic AMPs, Arg-rich, UCLL1c, XXA; BBMm)
Sequence Information.Source: amino acid SUBSTITUTION, cathelicidin analog, animal-derived, natural derivatives

Literature Information.Literature: Sequence analysis: APD analysis reveals that this sequence is similar (87.5%) toRI-16K: 19%; R: 38%; L=W: 13%.Activity: active against E. coli (MIC 4-8 uM), S. typhimurium 7731 (MIC 8 uM), S. aureus 29213 (MIC 8 uM), S. epidermidis 12228 (MIC 4 uM), S. faecalis 29212 (MIC 8 uM).Antimicrobial robustness: NaCl-insensitive:E. coli (150 mM salt); KCl-insensitive:E. coli (4.5 mM salt); NH4Cl-insensitive:E. coli (6 uM salt); MgCl2-insensitive:E. coli (1 mM salt);  ZnCl2-insensitive:E. coli (8 uM salt); FeCl3-insensitive:E. coli (4 uM salt); Salt-insensitive:S. aureus: NaCl-sensitive:S. aureus (150 mM salt); KCl-insensitive:S. aureus (4.5 mM salt); NH4Cl-insensitive:S. aureus (6 uM salt); MgCl2-insensitive:S. aureus (1 mM salt);  ZnCl2-insensitive:S. aureus (8 uM salt); FeCl3-insensitive:S. aureus (4 uM salt).Structure: random coil in PBS and helical in 50% TFE or 30 mM SDS micelles.In vitro toxicity: human RBC, 5% hemolysis >256 uM, not hemo.lytic.MOA:bacteria:E. coli: permeated bacterial membranes.
Literature Information.Author: Zhu X, Dong N, Wang Z, Ma Z, Zhang L, Ma Q, Shan A.2014
Literature Information.Title: Design of imperfectly amphipathic alpha-helical antimicrobial peptides with enhanced cell selectivity.
